Class javachart.chart.DiscontinuousLine 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Line
           |
           +----javachart.chart.DiscontinuousLine
public class DiscontinuousLine
extends Line
Subclasses Line to create discontinuities wherever a Datum's Y2 value is equal to -1.0

DiscontinuousLine(Dataset[], AxisInterface, AxisInterface, Plotarea)

doElementLabel(Graphics, int, int)
Overrides Line to eliminate labels for missing data
doLine(Graphics, int)
Draws a discontinuous plotline for a single dataset.
doMarkers(Graphics, int)
Overrides Line to eliminate markers for missing data

DiscontinuousLine 
  public DiscontinuousLine(Dataset d[],
                           AxisInterface xAx,
                           AxisInterface yAx,
                           Plotarea subplot)
Parameters:
d - Array of Datasets
xAx - X Axis to scale this Line's Datasets
yAx - Y Axis to scale this Line's Datasets
subplot - Plotarea beneath this Line component

doLine 
  protected void doLine(Graphics g,
                        int whichSet)
Draws a discontinuous plotline for a single dataset. Called by doLines
Parameters:
g - Graphics class to draw
whichSet - index into array of Dataset classes
